The <S%H136>Lord<s%> hath swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4999>habitations<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2550>pitied:<s%> he hath thrown <S%H2040>down<s%> in his <S%H5678>wrath<s%> the <S%H4013>strongholds<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> he hath brought them <S%H5060>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground:<s%> he hath <S%H2490>polluted<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> thereof.

He hath cut <S%H1438>off<s%> in his <S%H2750>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> he hath <S%H7725>drawn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> and he <S%H1197>burned<s%> against <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> like a <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> which <S%H398>devoureth<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

He hath <S%H1869>bent<s%> his <S%H7198>bow<s%> like an <S%H341>enemy:<s%> he <S%H5324>stood<s%> with his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> as an <S%H6862>adversary,<s%> and <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H4261>pleasant<s%> to the <S%H5869>eye<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> he poured <S%H8210>out<s%> his <S%H2534>fury<s%> like <S%H784>fire.<s%>

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> as an <S%H341>enemy:<s%> he hath swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> he hath swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H759>palaces:<s%> he hath <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> his <S%H4013>strongholds,<s%> and hath <S%H7235>increased<s%> in the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8386>mourning<s%> and <S%H592>lamentation.<s%>

And he hath violently taken <S%H2554>away<s%> his <S%H7900>tabernacle,<s%> as if it were of a <S%H1588>garden:<s%> he hath <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> his places of the <S%H4150>assembly:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath caused the solemn <S%H4150>feasts<s%> and <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> to be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and hath <S%H5006>despised<s%> in the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> hath cast <S%H2186>off<s%> his <S%H4196>altar,<s%> he hath <S%H5010>abhorred<s%> his <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> he hath given <S%H5462>up<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of her <S%H759>palaces;<s%> they have <S%H5414>made<s%> a <S%H6963>noise<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of a solemn <S%H4150>feast.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H2803>purposed<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> he hath stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> a <S%H6957>line,<s%> he hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>withdrawn<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H4480>destroying:<s%> <S%H1104><s%> therefore he made the <S%H2426>rampart<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> to <S%H56>lament;<s%> they <S%H535>languished<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

Her <S%H8179>gates<s%> are <S%H2883>sunk<s%> into the <S%H776>ground;<s%> he hath <S%H6>destroyed<s%> and <S%H7665>broken<s%> her <S%H1280>bars:<s%> her <S%H4428>king<s%> and her <S%H8269>princes<s%> are among the <S%H1471>Gentiles:<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> more; her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2377>vision<s%> from the <S%H4480>LORD.<s%> <S%H3068><s%>

The <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and keep <S%H1826>silence:<s%> they have cast <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H7218>heads;<s%> they have <S%H2296>girded<s%> themselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth:<s%> the <S%H1330>virgins<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> hang <S%H3381>down<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> do <S%H3615>fail<s%> with <S%H1832>tears,<s%> my <S%H4578>bowels<s%> are <S%H2560>troubled,<s%> my <S%H3516>liver<s%> is <S%H8210>poured<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H7667>destruction<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people;<s%> because the <S%H5768>children<s%> and the <S%H3243>sucklings<s%> <S%H5848>swoon<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets<s%> of the <S%H7151>city.<s%>

They <S%H559>say<s%> to their <S%H517>mothers,<s%> <S%H346>Where<s%> is <S%H1715>corn<s%> and <S%H3196>wine?<s%> when they <S%H5848>swooned<s%> as the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> when their <S%H5315>soul<s%> was poured <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> their <S%H517>mothers'<s%> <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>

What <S%H4100>thing<s%> shall I take to <S%H5749>witness<s%> for thee? what <S%H4100>thing<s%> shall I <S%H1819>liken<s%> to thee, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H7737>equal<s%> to thee, that I may <S%H5162>comfort<s%> thee, O <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H7667>breach<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> like the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H7495>heal<s%> thee?

Thy <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H2372>seen<s%> <S%H7723>vain<s%> and foolish <S%H8602>things<s%> for thee: and they have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>discovered<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thine <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> to turn <S%H7725>away<s%> thy <S%H7622>captivity;<s%> but have <S%H2372>seen<s%> for thee <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H4864>burdens<s%> and causes of <S%H4065>banishment.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> that pass <S%H5674>by<s%> <S%H1870><s%> <S%H5606>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> thee; they <S%H8319>hiss<s%> and <S%H5128>wag<s%> their <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> saying, Is <S%H2063>this<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> that men <S%H7945>call<s%> <S%H559><s%> The <S%H3632>perfection<s%> of <S%H3308>beauty,<s%> The <S%H4885>joy<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth?<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> have <S%H6475>opened<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee: they <S%H8319>hiss<s%> and <S%H2786>gnash<s%> the <S%H8127>teeth:<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> We have swallowed her <S%H1104>up:<s%> <S%H389>certainly<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> that we looked <S%H7945>for;<s%> <S%H6960><s%> we have <S%H4672>found,<s%> we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> it.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H2161>devised;<s%> he hath <S%H1214>fulfilled<s%> his <S%H565>word<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> in the <S%H4480>days<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of <S%H6924>old:<s%> he hath thrown <S%H2040>down,<s%> and hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2550>pitied:<s%> and he hath caused thine <S%H341>enemy<s%> to <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> thee, he hath set <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of thine <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>

Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> O <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> let <S%H1832>tears<s%> run <S%H3381>down<s%> like a <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night:<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> thyself <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H6314>rest;<s%> let <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H1323>apple<s%> of thine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H1826>cease.<s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> cry <S%H7442>out<s%> in the <S%H3915>night:<s%> in the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H821>watches<s%> pour <S%H8210>out<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord:<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thy <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> him <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of thy young <S%H5768>children,<s%> that <S%H5848>faint<s%> for <S%H7458>hunger<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2351>street.<s%>

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5027>consider<s%> to <S%H4310>whom<s%> thou hast <S%H5953>done<s%> <S%H3541>this.<s%> Shall the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and <S%H5768>children<s%> of a span <S%H2949>long?<s%> shall the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> be <S%H2026>slain<s%> in the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord?<s%>
